amendment.description: To prohibit legislation that makes America sick again.

action.text: Amendment SA 8 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive section 305(b)(2) of the CBA with respect to amendment SA 8 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 52. Record Vote Number: 2.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 305(b)(2) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 8.
Amendment SA 8 proposed by Senator Kaine.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive section 305(b)(2) of the CBA with respect to amendment SA 8 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 52. Record Vote Number: 2.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 8 proposed by Senator Kaine.
